TopicTitle: Modifying the text inside the career popups

Articles.Content:
Hello.

Is it possible to modify the career start-up messages that appear to explain what things are for a first-time player?

I cannot find their .cfg files.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-26T14:02:05Z" title="05/26/2015 02:02  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 26, 2015</time> by TruthQuark**

[TimChen44](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/82601-TimChen) (the [Chinese](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/119221-Chinese-localization-projects?highlight=chinese+localization) translater) found a way to extract texts like those from the KSP code. 

I'm using that for my translation plugin (WIP). This method will be used by a few other[language patches](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94908-International-Project-Language-Patches-Translate-the-game) (like the [Spanish](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/89936-Plugin-1-0-x-Traducci%C3%B3n-al-castellano-v3-4-BETA-Actualizado-05-05-2015) one) in the future.

These texts aren't stored in .cfg files, that's why you can't find them. What do you replace them with ?

An example of my WIP French patch which replaces the texts you're looking for :

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/L05mt)

Does your translation plugin have a cfg file I can edit? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

No, it's actually .xml file you can edit.

I'm cooking that for you, I come back in a few minutes ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[Edit]

It also replaces KSP code, and the only OS you can use ATM is Windows.

- - - Updated - - -

Tell me the directory and file name you want the mod file to have before I give you this, I need it to compile that stuff ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-27T10:26:41Z" title="05/27/2015 10:26  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 27, 2015</time> by simon56modder**

> 
> Yes ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
> [edit]
> 
> I compile that again because I've made something wrong...![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Take your time ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Download the pack from here : [http://www./download/mpajjxm2aha7dsl/](http://www./download/mpajjxm2aha7dsl/)

Note that it's only compatible with **Windows version 1.0.2**  **: 1.0/1.0.1 doesn't work, and Mac/Linux aren't compatible.**

Don't forget to **merge** folders and **replace** files when you install the plugin.

In that pack you'll find a GameData/PopupText. There are 2 files here :

**texts.xml** contains the texts you can edit.

**stockTexts.xml** contains stock base texts, do not edit it.

I've only included the career-popup related texts, but if you find other interesting things in stockTexts.xml, feel free to add the xml node from stockTexts to texts and edit it ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

Do you want me to link people interested in my mod to this page as a dependency, or can I integrate it in my mod's download and link to your page as well?

PS: Where is your mod page? ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

That's a mod I created just for you, you can do whatever you want with that.

You can integrate this page if you want ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> That's a mod I created just for you, you can do whatever you want with that.
> You can integrate this page if you want ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thanks. I integrated the mod, but I also linked to the specific post you created.

I highly suggest creating a separate add-on release page for it. It's actually helpful for many modders. I have no right to do it in your stead ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Yes, that's something I'm working on. I'll send you a private message when it will be done.
